contextId.occurrenceNote: Here Balaam refers to himself as "He." (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
contextId.glQuote: He speaks ... He sees ... he bows

contextId.occurrenceNote: A singular pronoun is used because the Amalekites are spoken of as a single person. (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-123person]])
